content.question: Akhenaton, Nefertiti, and three daughters demonstrates change within ancient Egyptian artistic traditions through its

choices.label: use of hierarchical scale to emphasize differences in social status
rendering of the human body with elongated, curvilinear forms

content.answer: rendering of the human body with elongated, curvilinear forms

topic.text: 2.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
